articles.title: Congratulations to Senegalese PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Senegalese PM
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Mahammed Boune Abdallah Dionne upon his stay in office as prime minister of the Republic of Senegal.
					 The message wished the prime minister fresh success in his work for realizing the project "Emerging Senegal", expressing the belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Trying to Deploy Tactical Nuclear Weapons into S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Trying to Deploy Tactical Nuclear Weapons into S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Institute of American Studies, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Friday in connection with the fact that the Trump Administration is publicizing through the media the "possibility of redeploying tactical nuclear weapons" into south Korea and developing up-to-date miniaturized nuclear bomb.
					 Recently, NBC and other American press reported that the Trump administration is currently examining various plans of developing up-to-date miniaturized nuclear bomb of low intensity to deal with nuclear threats posed by countries like the DPRK and Russia, and it will not rule out the option of redeploying tactical nuclear weapons into south Korea in case the south Korean "government" so requests.
					
					 The fact that the deliberate leakage of the information about tactical nuclear weapons by the Trump administration coincides with its moves to impose heinous sanctions, pressure and military threat on the DPRK, raises the alarm about the intention of the U.S. to unleash an actual nuclear war in the Korean peninsula
					
					 The U.S. has generated the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula by deploying more than 1,000 nuclear weapons into south Korea since 1950s and turning it into the front-line base for nuclear war, and imposed constant nuclear threat on the DPRK.
					
					 In the early 1990s, as the international support for the just anti-nuclear, peace policy and sincere efforts of the DPRK increased, the U.S. declared the withdrawal of nuclear weapons from south Korea, but it never stopped blackmailing and threatening the DPRK with its nuclear assets.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, continuous nuclear threat and vicious hostile policy of the U.S. towards DPRK are the very reason the DPRK gained access to nukes and strengthened its nuclear force for self-defense.
					
					 Besides, the redeployment of the tactical nuclear weapons, which are meant to be used for actual warfare beyond the purpose of mere deterrence, into the Korean peninsula vividly reveals the vicious aim of the U.S. to wage a nuclear war on this land.
					
					 The attempt of the U.S. to deploy tactical nuclear weapons into south Korea and develop up-to-date miniaturized nuclear bombs is targeted at its strategic rivals in the region as well as the DPRK, and it will increase the tension in the Korean Peninsula and the region and instigate intense arms race.
					
					 The nuclear threat of the U.S. which is growing more vicious propels the DPRK to continuous development of all means of counterattack including tactical nuclear weapons to the highest level at a maximum speed and to faster deployment of these means ready for battle.
					
					 The U.S. which gave rise to the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and pushes the nuclear confrontation between the DPRK and U.S. towards the brink of explosion, shall be held responsible for all catastrophic consequences to follow.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Germany
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Germany
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK State Commission of Quality Management led by Chairman Ri Chol Jin left here on Friday to take part in the 2017 general meeting of the International Organization for Standardization due in Berlin of Germany.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves for Turkmenistan
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves for Turkmenistan
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Vice-Chairman Son Kwang Ho, who is vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, left here Friday to attend the 36th meeting of the Olympic Council of Asia and the 5th Asia Indoor and Martial Arts Games due in Turkmenistan.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Teams and Delegations Here
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Teams and Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Taekwon-Do teams and delegations  of different countries arrived here on Friday to take part in the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships.
					 They include Greece, New Zealand, Nepal, Germany, Russia, Lebanon, Hungary, Mozambique, Bangladesh, Sweden, Slovenia, China, Czech Republic, Cambodia, Thailand, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Cyprus, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, Uganda, Uruguay, India and Ethiopia.

articles.title: Algerian President Celebrates Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Algerian President Celebrates Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in El-Djezair on September 10 to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017 Closes
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017 Closes
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of IT successes 2017 closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here on Friday.
					 A lot of successes made by the scientists and technicians in the drive for breaking through the cutting edge were introduced at the exhibition held under the sponsorship of the National IT Administration.
					
					 During the exhibition, IT successes and experience were widely introduced and exchanged through the show and presentation of new products and technologies.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, leading officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions, officials concerned and officials and working people of those units which contributed to the exhibition.

articles.title: Young Korean People Glorify Era of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Young Korean People Glorify Era of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- There is in the DPRK a powerful youth organization with five-million-strong youth ranks. It is the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					 Under the deep trust and loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea, the youth league is demonstrating its strong organizing ability and unity.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made public a historic letter "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun" on September 18, Juche 103 (2014), which marked a milestone in making the youth league organizations and young people always advance straight ahead, following the Party.
					
					 After the publication of the letter, the spirit of Paektusan hero youth and legendary tales about heroic youth were created.
					
					 A number of youths were awarded the title of Labor Hero, the Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and the Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and many units were honored with the Young Vanguard Model Primary Committee and the Young Vanguard Model Primary Organization and the Songun Youth Torch Prize.
					
					 During the 70-day and 200-day campaigns last year, many young people contributed to the construction of more than a hundred projects and over 80,000 young people overfulfilled their yearly national economic plans.
					
					 In the all-people general offensive toward the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners this year, tens of youth shock brigades in the coal industrial sector carried out their yearly and first half-yearly plans till May. They are becoming the vanguard and shock brigade in building a socialist power.
					
					 After the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits held in May 2015, an increasing number of youths have done admirable deeds of devoting themselves to the society, collective and comrades and volunteering to work at the difficult and consuming fields.
					
					 Today, the young Korean people are fully displaying their wisdom and pluck in the noteworthy struggle for glorifying the great era of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: War Moves of U.S. and S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
War Moves of U.S. and S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Any accidental case or military conflict will be led to an all-out war in a moment on the Korean peninsula where a touch-and-go situation prevails, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The ceaseless war exercises of the U.S. and south Korea should never be overlooked as they are deliberate provocative moves to stifle the DPRK over its steps for bolstering the nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 Such military moves are a revelation of the wicked scenario to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The wicked scheme has been fully revealed. The U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities are evidently making last-ditch efforts to provoke a war for aggression on the DPRK, aware that sanctions and pressure cannot work on it.
					
					 It is the deserved rights of the DPRK to resolutely counter their heinous scheme for attack through a preemptive nuclear strike that has entered an extremely dangerous stage.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean warmongers persist in reckless action in disregard of our repeated warnings, we will decisively take a strong retaliatory step.

articles.title: U.S. Fate Is in Hands of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Fate Is in Hands of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday says that the DPRK carried out a successful test of H-bomb for ICBM with its own efforts and technology despite vicious sanctions and pressure put on it by the hostile forces.
					 No one can ignore the tremendous national power and potentials of the DPRK and what has become irreversible is its strategic position as a responsible nuclear weapons state which exercises huge influence on peace in Asia and the rest of the world, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is swaggering as if it did something big after cooking up another "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK by mobilizing its followers and riff-raffs.
					
					 Through the two successful ICBM test-launches the DPRK has put the whole U.S. mainland in its striking range and clearly showed that it can turn the American empire into a sea in flames through sudden surprise attack from any region and area.
					
					 Even though the DPRK gave advices and warnings enough to be understood, the U.S. has persisted in the unrealistic hostile policy toward it, seeking to realize it by force. This has pushed the U.S. into such a tragic situation as today.
					
					 The U.S. might have complex mental state due to its consecutive setbacks in the confrontation with the DPRK, but it has to draw a lesson and make a correct judgment.
					
					 Whatever means and methods the U.S. may employ, they will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. fate is in the hands of the DPRK.

articles.title: Destiny of Colonial Servant Is Miserable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Destiny of Colonial Servant Is Miserable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye is paying dearly for her thrice-cursed crimes as she had turned south Korea into a graveyard of freedom, human rights and hopes since she took power by whole gamut of gimmick and fraud.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article:
					
					 Those resorting to treachery with dependence on outside forces are doomed to face hatred and condemnation from the people and be forsaken by their master.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, the worst fool and parasite who had to live on the outsiders, engrossed in sycophancy and submission, is now deserted by the U.S. master though she dedicated all her to it. This is the miserable end of a colonial stooge.
					
					 The successive presidents of south Korea were all puppets controlled by the U.S. master. They had treated the U.S. as their ancestor, but the latter dealt with them as its colonial servants and mercilessly replaced them if unnecessary. To the U.S., they were nothing but serving tools for its colonial rule and domination over south Korea.
					
					 That's why the U.S. rejects a south Korean president if unnecessary, although he or she may be a yes man.
					
					 It is the fate of a colonial servant to face a tragic end, being treated as an abandoned dog, no matter how faithfully she or he serves the master. Now is the time for the present south Korean authorities to understand the truth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Overseas Aggression Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Overseas Aggression Moves
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Japan staged PAC-3 interceptor missile fielding drill in Yokota U.S. air-force base and Iwakuni U.S. army base and then staged the similar exercises in Misawa U.S. military base.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says crafty Japan cited "missile threats" from the DPRK as a pretext this time, too, but it is little short of shouting wine and selling vinegar.
					
					 It is a known secret that PAC-3 interceptor missile system equipped by the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" constitutes part of the U.S. missile defense system for containing regional big powers, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is taking offensive military actions in the disputed waters in the South Sea of China while staging the fielding drill. It is reported that Japan planned to involve even Britain in the joint military drill.
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of Japan to realize at any cost the old dream of the "Greater East-Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Japan, which has secured a political and military foothold for overseas aggression with the backing of the U.S., is stepping up its military actions in the disputed waters in the South Sea of China as part of its efforts to put the plan into a practice.
					
					 Now, not content with getting help from the U.S., it is inveigling European countries like Britain to tighten military pressure.
					
					 The situation proves that "missile threats" from the DPRK much touted by Japan is nothing but a pretext for covering up the military fanatics' ambition for overseas aggression in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Missile Strike Drills in S. Korea
articles.content:
Missile Strike Drills in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers staged a provocative missile strike drill aiming at major facilities of the DPRK on Sept. 12, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 F-15K fighter in the sky above the West Sea of Korea fired an air-to-ground missile of hundreds of kilometers of range at the target in the firing range on Jik Islet in the waters off Kunsan, North Jolla Province.
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers unhesitatingly said the drill was a demonstration of counteraction capability against "provocation of the north".
					
					 They declared that they would introduce more missiles from abroad.
					
					 On Sept. 4 they staged ground-to-ground missile and air-to-ground missile launching drills aiming at nuclear facilities of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Hungary
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Hungary posted President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" on its internet homepage on September 4 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies that the Korean nation is the driving force for the reunification of the country and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Foreigners Praise DPRK as Independent Power
articles.content:
Foreigners Praise DPRK as Independent Power
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between August 26 and September 4 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, India and Pakistan.
					
					 Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the DPRK, which has consistently adhered to the principle of independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence, is demonstrating its dignity as power of independence in the international arena.
					
					 W. A. Duminduwardane, chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies, noted that the DPRK has consistently aspired to the building of a socialist state centered on the popular masses and enforced all sorts of popular policies, setting the improvement of people's livelihood as the supreme principle of the party and state's activities.
					
					 Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, stated that the DPRK has developed into a people's country further thriving under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Berkat Ullah, chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, stressed that Kim Jong Un turned the DPRK into a nuclear power of Juche which any formidable enemy dare not provoke.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a la reciente electa presidenta singapurense
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a la reciente electa presidenta singapurense
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion a la reciente electa presidenta de la Republica de Singapur, Halimah Jacob.
					Expresando su esperanza de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Singapur sobre la base de los principios de respecto a la soberania y de beneficios mutuos, el remitente formulo sincero votos por exitos en el trabajo de la destinataria para la prosperidad de su pais.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo senegales, permanecido en su cargo
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo senegales, permanecido en su cargo
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo senegales Mahammed Boune Abdallah Dionne, permanecido en su cargo.
					 Expresando su conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las largas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente formulo votos por nuevo exito en las labores del destinatario por realizar el plan "Senegal emergiendo".

articles.title: Portavoz de IAN critica intento de EE.UU. de introducir de nuevo armas nucleares tacticas
articles.content:
Portavoz de IAN critica intento de EE.UU. de introducir de nuevo armas nucleares tacticas
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que la administracion Trump publica en la prensa la "posibilidad de reubicacion de armas nucleares tacticas" en el Sur de Corea y el desarrollo de la ultramoderna mini-bomba nuclear, el portavoz del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 15 la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, la cadena NBC y otros medios de prensa estadounidenses informan que la administracion Trump esta revisando varios proyectos de desarrollo de la mini-bomba nuclear ultramoderna de baja intensidad para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea), Rusia y otros y tiene la posicion de no descartar el plan de reubicar armas nucleares tacticas en el Sur de Corea si lo pide el "gobierno" surcoreano.
					
					La administracion Trump divulga en la prensa el problema de armas nucleares tacticas justamente cuando aplica la sancion y presion mas brutales contra la RPDC amenazandola en lo militar, lo que deviene un movimiento peligrosisimo que prenuncia la provocacion real de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Desde la decada de 1950, EE.UU. introdujo mas de un millar de armas nucleares tacticas en el suelo surcoreano convirtiendolo en la base avanzada de guerra nuclear y causo asi el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana comenzando a chantajear y amenazar con esos artefactos a la RPDC.
					
					A principios de la decada de 1990, anuncio la retirada de armas nucleares del territorio surcoreano ante la crecida del apoyo internacional a la justa politica antinuclear y por la paz de la RPDC y a sus esfuerzos sinceros a tal efecto.
					
					Aun despues de ese anuncio, nunca ha dejado de amenazar y chantajear con sus propiedades nucleares de diferentes tipos.
					
					Volvemos a dejar en claro que la incesante amenaza y chantaje nucleares y la brutal politica de EE.UU. contra la RPDC son el factor que obligo a esta a poseer e incrementar las fuerzas armadas nucleares de caracter autodefensivo.
					
					El intento de introducir nuevamente en la Peninsula Coreana el arma nuclear tactica tomando como premisa su uso en el combate real por encima de la etapa de mera disuasion demuestra directamente la mala ambicion de EE.UU. de desatar a toda costa en esta tierra la guerra nuclear.
					
					El proposito de EE.UU. de desplegar de nuevo ese armamento en suelo surcoreano y desarrollar la bomba arriba mencionada agravara aun mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y causara la renida carrera armamentista porque entre sus blancos figuran no solo la RPDC sino tambien los rivales estrategicos de la region.
					
					La creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. hace a la RPDC desarrollar sin parar y en el maximo nivel y la maxima velocidad el arma nuclear tactica y otros medios de reaccion y desplegarlos con prisa para el combate real.
					
					EE.UU., autor que causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y lleva al borde de explosion la confrontacion nuclear RPDC-EE.UU., sera responsable de todas las consecuencias catastroficas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios de agresion a ultramar en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios de agresion a ultramar en Japon
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en la base aerea norteamericana en Yokota y la otra militar del mismo pais en Iwakuni de Japon los ejercicios de despliegue de PAC-3 que fueron repetidos seguidamente en el enclave de Misawa.
					 La supuesta "amenaza de misil" proveniente de la RPDC ha sido el pretexto que utilizaron los astutos reaccionarios japoneses para justificar esas maniobras militares.
					
					  Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  Es un secreto bien conocido que el sistema de misil interceptor PAC-3, de que disponen las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon, forma parte del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. para doblegar a las potencias regionales.
					
					  Al paralelo del entrenamiento de ubicacion de misiles interceptores, Japon emprende las acciones militares ofensivas en las aguas en litigio del Mar Sur de China.
					
					  Segun trascendidos, ese pais debatio el tema de librar ejercicios militares conjuntos involucrando hasta a Gran Bretana.
					
					  Sigue invariable la ambicion de Japon de realizar sin falta su anejado sueno de establecer la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					  Japon viene consolidando la base politico-militar de la agresion a ultramar bajo el amparo de EE.UU. y como parte de los pasos para ponerla en practica, dinamiza las operaciones militares en las aguas en litigio del Mar Sur de China.
					
					  Insatisfecho de la ayuda de EE.UU., intenta ahora endurecer la presion militar con el apoyo de Gran Bretana y otros paises europeos.
					
					  La realidad demuestra que la "amenaza de misil" de la RPDC, de que no se cansan de hablar los reaccionarios japoneses, es un cartel falso para ocultar la ambicion de los fanaticos de militarismo de retomar el camino de agresion a ultramar en el Nordeste Asiatico.
